content:
The paratroopers of the 79th Separate Airborne Assault Brigade destroyed 3 tanks and 4 combat armored cars of the invaders.

About thisWroteand published the corresponding video in the Command of the Airborne Assault Forces of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

“Honor technique is burnt, Russian infantry is destroyed. This is how the next assault of the invaders in the Novomikhailivka area, where the Tavriya paratroopers met the Tavriya, " - the message reads.

As it is noted, these personnel-the powerful combat work of soldiers of the 79th ODSBR for two days.

"As a result, 3 Russian tanks were destroyed, 6 more were damaged. Our soldiers also burned 4 armored combat vehicles," the department emphasized.

The command also added that the invaders who miraculously survived were the operators of drones.

As reported by ArmyInform, a group of Russian servicemenSCO snipers were destroyedduring night work.
title: Taurian paratroopers showed how the tanks, BBM and infantry of the Russians are smoking
description: This was written and published by the appropriate video in the command of the landing troops ...
author: Army Inform
